text:
An employee primarily employed on a
nonself-propelled barge used as a “stationary” auxiliary facility to off­shore
drilling activities, rather than as a means of transportation is not a seaman
within Secs 13(a)(12) and 13(b)(6).
html: An employee primarily employed on a nonself-propelled barge used as a “stationary” auxiliary facility to off­shore drilling activities, rather than as a means of transportation is not a seaman within Secs 13(a)(12) and 13(b)(6).
